snippet: The licenses would carry a distinction on the front of the card that states it may be used for driving, not as federal identification.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown signs bill allowing illegal immigrants to obtain driver's licenses; licenses would carry a distinction on the front of the card that states it may be used for driving, not as federal identification.
lead_paragraph: The licenses would carry a distinction on the front of the card that states it may be used for driving, not as federal identification.

headline.main: California: Illegal Immigrants Allowed to Get Driver’s Licenses
headline.print_headline: California: Illegal Immigrants Allowed To Get Driver’s Licenses
